SA11sanss18u:22: śraddhêndriyaṃ vīryêndriyaṃ smṛtîndriyaṃ samādhîndriyaṃ prajñêndriyam iti //tatra katamā śraddhā /

SA11sanss18u:34: sarvadṛṣṭikṛtāni ca nânuśete sarvabuddhadharmān balavaiśāradyaprabhṛtīṃś ca śraddadhāti /

SA11sanss18u:39: yān dharmān vīryêndriyeṇa samudānayati tān dharmān
SA11sanss18u:43: yān dharmān smṛtîndriyeṇa na vipraṇāśayati tān samādhîndriyeṇâikâgrīkarotîdam ucyate samādhîndriyaṃ //
SA11sanss18u:45: yān dharmān samādhîndriyeṇâikâgrīkaroti tān prajñêndriyeṇa pratyavekṣate pratividhyati /

SA11sanss18u:72: vandāmi te 'samajñānaparā sadṛśo na te 'sti tribhave virajā //
SA11sanss18u:73: mṛdu cāru snigdha śubha keśa nakhā girirājatulya tava côṣṇir iha /

SA11sanss18u:81: rūpeṇa câpratisamo 'si jinaḥ prabhayā ca bhāsayasi kṣetraśatān /

SA11sanss18u:126: bhavate jagad vividhaduḥkhaharaṃ spṛśate padaṃ ca paramaṃ virajaṃ //
SA11sanss18u:127: mārgajña mārgakuśalā bhagavan kupathān nivārayasi lokam imaṃ /

SA11sanss18u:129: puṇyârthikasya tava puṇyanidhe satatâkṣayā bhavati puṇyakriyā /

SA11sanss18u:147_0: punar aparaṃ buddhā bhagavanto mahāpuṇyajñānasaṃbhārā mahāmaitrīmahākaruṇāgocarā
SA11sanss18u:149_2: dharmapriyā dharmadharā dharmâhārā dharmabhiṣajo dharmêśvarā dharmasvāmino dharmadānapatayo
SA11sanss18u:149_3: nityatyāgâbhiratā nityâpramattā nityavivekâbhiratāḥ sarvatra tīrthasetubhūtā mahārājamārgaprakhyā
SA11sanss18u:151: evaṃ ca tān anusmṛtya tadguṇapariniṣpattyarthaṃ smṛtim upasthāpayatîti //
SA11sanss18u:155: yae ete buddhā bhagavanto 'nantâparyantaguṇâite dharmajā dharmapadā dharmanirmitā dharmâdhipateyā dharmaprabhā dharmagocarā dharmapratiśaraṇā dharmaniṣpannāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:157: yāny api laukikāni lokôttarāṇi ca sukhāni santi /
SA11sanss18u:163: dharmagauraveṇa dharmapratiśaraṇena dharmaparāyaṇena dharmasāreṇa dharmânva ... dharmapratipannena /
SA11sanss18u:166: samo hi dharmaḥ samaḥ satveṣu pravartate /
SA11sanss18u:177: na dharmôdāre pravartate hīneṣu na pravartate /
SA11sanss18u:180: na dharmaḥ śuddheṣu pravartate kṣateṣu na pravartate /
SA11sanss18u:181: utkarṣâpakarṣâpagato hi dharmas tathā mayā dharmasadṛśacittena bhavitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss18u:182: na dharmâryeṣu pravartate pṛthagjaneṣu na pravartate /
SA11sanss18u:185: na dharmo divā pravartate rātrau na pravartate /
SA11sanss18u:186: rātryāṃ vā pravartate divā na pravartate /
SA11sanss18u:192: na dharmasyônatvaṃ na pūrṇatvam aprameyâsaṃkhyeyo hi dharmâkāśavan na kṣīyate na vardhate /
SA11sanss18u:203: tathā mayā dharmasadṛśacittena bhavitavyaṃ /na dharmo 'nuśayaṃ vahati /
SA11sanss18u:204: niranuśayo hi dharmaḥ /tathā mayā dharmasadṛśacittena bhavitavyam /
SA11sanss18u:208: evaṃ bodhisatvo dharmavad dharme smṛtim upasthāpayati /
SA11sanss18u:210: saṃgho hi dharmavādī dharmacaraṇo dharmacintako dharmakṣetraṃ dharmadharo dharmapratiśaraṇo dharmapūjako dharmakṛtyakārī dharmagocaro dharmacāritrasaṃpannaḥ /
SA11sanss18u:215: tatra bodhisatvasya saṃgham anusmarataḥ evaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanss18u:216: yae ete saṃghasya bhūtā guṇâite mayâtmanaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ ca niṣpādayitavyêti //
SA11sanss18u:220: te jīrṇavyādhitā bhonti bodhisatvā mṛtam ātmāna darśayī /
SA11sanss18u:223: nityasaṃjñina satvānām anityam iti darśayī //satvaiḥ śatasahasrebhir ekarāṣṭre nimantritāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:224: sarveṣāṃ gṛha bhuñjanti sarvān nāmanti bodhaye //
SA11sanss18u:225: ye kecin mantravidyā vā śilpasthānā bahuvidhāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:228: yāvanto loka pāṣaṇḍāḥ sarvatra pravrajanti te /
SA11sanss18u:229: nānādṛṣṭigataṃ prāptāṃs te satvān paripācati // candrā vā bhonti sūryā vā śakrabrahmaprajêśvarāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:230: bhavanti āpas tejaś ca pṛthivī mārutas tathā //
SA11sanss18u:232: yena te satva mucyante sukhī bhonti a-
SA11sanss18u:238: avyāpāde niyojenti satvakoṭiśatān bahūn //mahāsaṃgrāmamadhye ca samapakṣā bhavanti te /
SA11sanss18u:240: ye câpi nirayāḥ kecid buddhakṣetreṣv acintiṣu /
SA11sanss18u:241: saṃcintya tatra gacchanti satvānāṃ hitakāraṇāt //yāvantyā gatayaḥ kāścit tiryagyonau prakāśitāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:242: sarvatra dharmaṃ deśenti tenôcyanti nāyakāḥ //kāmabhogāṃś ca darśenti dhyānaṃ ca dhyāyināṃ tathā /
SA11sanss18u:243: vidhvasta māraṃ kurvanti avatāraṃ na denti te //
SA11sanss18u:244: agnimadhye yathā padmam abhūtaṃ taṃ vinirdiśet /
SA11sanss18u:245: evaṃ kāmāṃś ca dhyānaṃ câbhūtaṃ te vidarśayī //
SA11sanss18u:247: saṃcintya gaṇikāṃ bhonti puṃsām ākarṣaṇāya te /
SA11sanss18u:248: rāgâṅku saṃlobhya buddhajñāne sthāpayanti te //grāmikāś ca sadā bhonti sârthavāhāḥ purohitāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:250: daridrāṇāṃ ca satvānāṃ nidhānā bhonti akṣayāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:251: teṣāṃ dānāni datvā ca bodhicittaṃ janenti te //
SA11sanss18u:255: abhayaṃ teṣu datvā ca paripācenti bodhaye //pañcâbhijñāś ca te bhūtvā ṛṣayo brahmacāriṇaḥ /
SA11sanss18u:256: śīle satvān niyojenti kṣāntisauratyasaṃyame //upasthānagurūn satvān paśyantîha viśāradāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:257: ceṭā bhavanti dāsā vā śiṣyatvam upayānti ca //yena yenâiva câṅgena satvo dharmarato bhavet /
SA11sanss18u:260: yeṣām anantā śikṣā hi anantaś câpi gocaraḥ /
SA11sanss18u:263: buddhair api vadadbhis tu guṇântaḥ suvaco bhaved /
SA11sanss18u:265: raśmi pramuñciya mālyaviyūhā mālyavataṃsaka mālya vitānāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:268: cūrṇavicitravikīrṇa samantān te jinapūja karonti maha-ātmā //

SA11sanss18u:275: nīlam aneka patāka vicitrā //dhvaja samalaṃkarite jinakṣetrāḥ te maṇijālavicitraviyūhā /
SA11sanss18u:276: paṭṭa patāka pralambita dāmā kiṅkiṇijāla jinasvaraghoṣān //

SA11sanss18u:294: yātuka dharmamukhāḥ pratiyantaḥ te tu samantavimokṣamukhena //
SA11sanss18u:295: satva vinenti yathâśaya loke ye tu samantavimokṣamukhena /
SA11sanss18u:296: satva vinenti yathâśaya loke teṣa nimitta na śakya grahītuṃ //
SA11sanss18u:297: kenacid eṣa samādhivikurvāḥ tena tivyūhata [[DOUBT]] agrasamādhiḥ /
SA11sanss18u:299: cintiya darśayi sarva vinenti yatra durbhikṣa sudurlabha sarvaṃ /
SA11sanss18u:300: ye pariṣkāra sukhâvaha loke tatra ca sarvabhiprāyakriyābhiḥ //
SA11sanss18u:301: dātu dadanti karonti jagârthaṃ te varabhojanapānarasâgraiḥ /
SA11sanss18u:306: rūpa vidarśiya satva vinenti darśana prītipraharṣaratānāṃ /
SA11sanss18u:308: rūpadhimukti jagad vinayanti te madhuraiḥ kalaviṅkarutebhī /
SA11sanss18u:310: ye catur evâśīti sahasrā yebhi jinā jagato 'rtha karonti /
SA11sanss18u:311: tebhita dharmaprabhedamukhebhiḥ satva vinenti yathâśaya loke //
SA11sanss18u:313: sarvakriyāsu sahāya bhavitvā satva vinenti sahāyamukhena //
SA11sanss18u:315: tebhi sahāya sahantiya pīḍāṃ sarvajagasya hitāya sukhāya //
SA11sanss18u:316: yatra na niṣkramaṇaṃ na ca dharmo jñāyati raṇyagato na ca mokṣaḥ /
SA11sanss18u:321: te daśa carya prabhāvayamānâcari dharma mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ /
SA11sanss18u:322: sarvam aśeṣata carya ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvayamāna karonti jagârthaṃ //
SA11sanss18u:324: tatra jarârdita vyādhinapṛṣṭā darśayi mṛtyuvaśaṃ avaśâtmā //
SA11sanss18u:326: prajvalitaṃ jaravyādhitamṛtyu loka nidarśayi satva vinenti //
SA11sanss18u:328: buddhamahâtma tu sūcayamānāḥ buddhaguṇebhi karonti jagârtham //
SA11sanss18u:330: darśayamāna tathāgata ṛddhī ṛddhivikurvita satva vinenti //te vividhehi upāyanayehi loka-
SA11sanss18u:333: loki alipta jale yatha padmaṃ prītiprasādakarā vicaranti //
SA11sanss18u:334: kāvyakarāḥ kavirāja bhavantī te naṭanartaka jhallakamallāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:337: grāmika nāyaka sārathi bhontī sârthika śreṣṭhika gṛhapati bhonti /
SA11sanss18u:341: arcciya santu tu loka viditvā karmavidhīṣu ajānaka satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:344: vidyabalâuṣadhi śāstravicitrāḥ sarva prabhāvita tebhi ṛṣībhiḥ //
SA11sanss18u:345: ye ṛṣiṇāṃ caraṇāḥ paramâgrā yatrâdhimukta sadevaku lokaḥ /
SA11sanss18u:346: ye vrataduṣkara ye tapaśreṣṭhāḥ sarvi prabhāvita tebhi vidūbhiḥ //
SA11sanss18u:351: dīrghajaṭāna kumāravratānāṃ teṣv api ācaryā hi bhavanti //
SA11sanss18u:353: cārika tīrthya daśa tritayānāṃ teṣv api ācaryā hi bhavanti //
SA11sanss18u:358: ye muṣaleśaya [[DOUBT]] yuktivihārī teṣv api ācaryā hi bhavanti //
SA11sanss18u:359: yāvata bāhirakāḥ pṛthutīrthyâśaya teṣv adhimukti samīkṣya /
SA11sanss18u:363: sūkṣmapadebhir upāyana yebhī satyaprakāśana teṣu karonti //
SA11sanss18u:372: te yathasatya niruktividhijñâivam aśeṣata ye jinadharmā /
SA11sanss18u:376: raśmim acintiyam utsṛjamānā raśmi pramuñciya satva vinenti //
SA11sanss18u:377: raśmi pramuñciya darśayamānā yāvata satva vijānita raśmi /
SA11sanss18u:378: teṣu sudarśana bhoti amogham hetu anuttari jñānavarasya //
SA11sanss18u:379: darśayi buddha vidarśayi dharmaṃ saṃgha nidarśayi mārga narāṇām /
SA11sanss18u:380: darśayi cetika te jinabimbā tena sudarśanaraśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:382: raśmi pramuñci prabhaṃkara nāmā yā prabha jihma karoti marūṇāṃ /
SA11sanss18u:383: sarvarajaṃ ca tamaṃ ca hanitvā so prabha bhāsati lokahitānāṃ //
SA11sanss18u:384: tāya prabhāsaya codita satvās te jinapūjapradīpa dharentī /
SA11sanss18u:385: te jinapūjapradīpa dharitvā lokapradīpakarā jina bhonti //
SA11sanss18u:386: tailapradīpa ghṛtasya pradīpā dāru tṛṇā naḍaveṇu pradīpān /
SA11sanss18u:388: raśmi pramuñciya pratāraṇi nāmā tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:390: dūṣita saṃskṛta varṇita śāntī tena pratāraṇi raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:391: raśmi pipāsavinodani nāmā tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:399: prītikarī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:400: prītiphuṭā varabodhinidānaṃ cinta janenti bhaviṣya svayaṃbhū //
SA11sanss18u:402: bhāṣita buddhaguṇāḥ sada kālaṃ prītikarī prabha tena nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:403: raśmi pramuñci ratiṃkara nāmā tāya prabhāsaya bodhita satvā /
SA11sanss18u:404: buddharatīrata dharmaratīrata saṃgharatīrata te sada bhonti //
SA11sanss18u:406: labdhanupattikakṣānti labhanti codita smārita ye bahu satvā //
SA11sanss18u:408: tena ratiṃkara raśmi nivṛttā //puṇyasamuccayaraśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvā /
SA11sanss18u:409: dānu dadanti vicitram anekaṃ prārthayamānu anuttaru bodhiṃ //
SA11sanss18u:410: āśaya pūritu yācanakānāṃ yajña nirargaḍa tair yajamānaiḥ /
SA11sanss18u:411: sarvabhiprāyata dānu daditvā puṇyasamuccaya raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:412: jñānavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:413: eka tu dharma mukhātu anekā dharmamukhān avabuddhi kṣaṇena //
SA11sanss18u:415: dharmaprabheda ... grāhita satvān arthaviniścaya jñāna vibhaktī /
SA11sanss18u:417: dharmapadârthavibhāṣaṇa kṛtvā jñānavatī prabha tena nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:418: prajñapradīpayâusari raśmi tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:421: dharmâsvāmika śūnya nirīhān bhāṣati prajñapradīpa nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:422: dharmavikurvaṇi raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvā /
SA11sanss18u:424: dharmadharāṇu parigrahu kṛtvā dhārmikarakṣa karitva ṛṣīṇāṃ /
SA11sanss18u:425: dharmânugraha kṛtva jagasya dharmavikurvaṇi raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:426: tyāgavatī yada raśmi vimuñcī tāya ya matsara codita satvā /
SA11sanss18u:429: bṛṃhita tyāga prasannam anena tyāgavatīprabha tena nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:430: niṣparidāha yâusari raśmiḥ tāya duḥśīlaya codita satvā /
SA11sanss18u:431: śīlaviśuddhi pratiṣṭhita bhūtvā cinta janenti bhaveya svayaṃbhūḥ //
SA11sanss18u:433: karmapathe kuśale pariśuddhe śīla samādayi yad bahusatvān /
SA11sanss18u:434: bodhayi citta samādayanena raśmi nivṛtta sa niṣparidāhaḥ //
SA11sanss18u:436: kṣāntiviyūha yâusari raśmi tāya yâkṣama codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:437: krodhakhilaṃ adhimāna jahitvā kṣāntiratīrata te sada bhonti //
SA11sanss18u:439: varṇita kṣāntiguṇāḥ sadakālaṃ tena nivṛtta sa kṣāntiviyūhā //
SA11sanss18u:440: raśmi uttaptavatī yada muñcī tāya kuśīdaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:441: yukta prayukta triṣū rataneṣu pūja karonti akhinnaprayogāḥ //
SA11sanss18u:442: yukta prayukta triṣū rataneṣu pūja karitvâkhinnaprayogāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:443: te catu mārapathâtikrāntāḥ kṣipra spṛśanti anuttara bodhiṃ //
SA11sanss18u:444: vīrya samādayi yad bahusatvān pūja karitva triṣū rataneṣu /
SA11sanss18u:445: dharma dharitva kṣayaṃgata kāle tenôtaptavatī prabha labdhā //
SA11sanss18u:446: śāntikarī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya vibhrāntaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:447: teṣu na rāgu na dveṣa na mohāḥ bodhita bhonti samāhita cittāḥ //
SA11sanss18u:448: pāpa kumitra kiliṣṭa carīye saṃgaṇikāvinivartana kṛtvā /
SA11sanss18u:449: varṇita dhyāna praśāntâraṇye śāntikarī prabha tena nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:450: prajñaviyūha yâusari raśmī tāya duḥprajña saṃcodita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:451: satyapratītya vimokṣanaye 'smin nidriya jñānagatiṃ gata bhonti //
SA11sanss18u:456: karā jina bhonti //rājyadhanâtmapriyaiḥ parityāgaiḥ dharma ya mārgita bodhinidānaṃ /
SA11sanss18u:457: taṃ ca satkṛtya prakāśiya dharmaṃ raśmi nivṛtta sa prajñaviyūhāḥ //
SA11sanss18u:458: buddhavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāya saṃcodita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:461: buddhabalâviprabhāvana kṛtvā buddhavatī prabha tena nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:462: te 'bhayaṃdada raśmi pramuñcī tāyâbhayârdita satva saspṛṣṭāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:464: ye 'bhayena nimantrita satvāḥ prāṇibadhāt tu nivārita bhonti /
SA11sanss18u:465: trāyita yaccharaṇâgata bhītās tena bhayaṃdada raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:468: rogavinodani mūla phaloṣadha ratna rasāyana gandhanulepān /
SA11sanss18u:469: phāṇita kṣīra madhū ghṛta telān bhojana pāna daditvaya labdhā //
SA11sanss18u:471: buddhanidarśani raśmi pramuñcī tāya sacoditâyu kṣayānte /
SA11sanss18u:472: buddhânusmari paśyiṣu buddham te cyuta gacchi sabuddhakkṣetraṃ //
SA11sanss18u:473: kāla karonti ca smārita buddhā darśitaprītakarā
SA11sanss18u:476: buddhagatāḥ śaraṇaṃ maraṇânte bhāsiya buddhanidarśani labdhā //
SA11sanss18u:477: dharmaprabhāvani raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāya saṃcodita satvā /
SA11sanss18u:478: dharma paṭhanti śṛṇvanti likhantī dharmaratī rata te sada bhonti //
SA11sanss18u:481: chanda janitva prayujyatha dharme bhāṣata dharmaprabhāvani labdhā //
SA11sanss18u:482: ghoṣavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī buddhasutā paricodanatāyāṃ /
SA11sanss18u:483: yātuka śabdapracāru triloke sarva tathāgataghoṣa śṛṇvanti //
SA11sanss18u:486: te 'mṛtaṃdada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:487: sarva pramāda ciraṃ prajahitvā sarvaguṇaiḥ pratipadyati yogaṃ //
SA11sanss18u:490: raśmi viśeṣavatī yada muñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:495: ya stuta varṇita bodhinidānaṃ tena viśeṣavatī prabha labdhā //
SA11sanss18u:496: ratnaviyūha yâusari raśmi tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:497: akṣara ratnanidhāna labhitvā pūjayi ratnavarebhi maharṣīn //
SA11sanss18u:498: ratnavisarga jine jinastūpe saṃgrahi kṛtsnajanaṃ ratanebhiḥ /
SA11sanss18u:499: ratnapradāna karitva jinānāṃ raśmi nivṛtta ya ratnaviyūhāḥ //
SA11sanss18u:500: gandhaprabhāsa yâusari raśmī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:501: ghrātvâmānuṣa gandha manojñān buddhaguṇe niyutāni bhavanti //
SA11sanss18u:508: raśmi prasādakarī yada muñcī pāṇitalôpama saṃsthihi bhūmiḥ /
SA11sanss18u:509: śodhayato ṛṣi āśramastūpān tena prasādakarī prabha labdhā //
SA11sanss18u:510: muñcati meghavatī yada raśmiṃ saṃsthihi gandha pravarṣati meghaṃ /
SA11sanss18u:514: bhūṣaṇavyūha pramuñcatu raśmīn nagnâcela subhūṣaṇa bhontī /
SA11sanss18u:517: raśmi rasâgravatī yada muñcī bhukṣita bhojya rasâgra labhantī /
SA11sanss18u:518: bhojana pāna vicitra rasâgrān datva rasâgravatī prabha labdhā //
SA11sanss18u:519: arthanidarśani muñcati raśmīn ratnanidhāna labhanti daridrāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:521: cakṣuviśodhani muñcati raśmīn andha tadā dṛśi rūpa vicitram /
SA11sanss18u:522: dīpapradāna jine jinastūpe cakṣuviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:523: śrotraviśodhani muñcati raśmīn śrotravihīna śruṇī pṛthuśabdān /
SA11sanss18u:525: ghrāṇaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn ghrāyi aghrāyitapūrva sugandhān /
SA11sanss18u:526: gandhapradāna jine jinastūpe ghrāṇaviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:527: jihvaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn snigdhamanojñarutai stuti buddhān /
SA11sanss18u:528: vāca durukta vivarjita rukṣā ślakṣṇôdīrita raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:529: kāyaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn indriyahīna suindriya bhonti /
SA11sanss18u:530: kāyapraṇāma jine jinastūpe kurvata kāyaviśodhani labdhvā //citta-
SA11sanss18u:532: viśodhani muñcati raśmīn unmatu sarva sacita bhavanti /
SA11sanss18u:533: citta samādhivaśânuga kṛtvā cittaviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:534: rūpaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn paśyiya cintiya rūpanarêndrān /
SA11sanss18u:536: śabdaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn śabdâśabdata śūnya vijānī /
SA11sanss18u:537: pratyaya jāta pratiśrutatulyaṃ śabdaprakāśana raśmi nivṛttā //
SA11sanss18u:538: gandhaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn sarva dugandha sugandha bhavantī /
SA11sanss18u:541: te rasaśodhani muñcati raśmīn sadviṣa nirviṣa bhonti rasâgrāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:543: sparśaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn kakkhaṭa sparśa mṛdū sukha bhontī /
SA11sanss18u:544: śaktitriśūlâsi [[DOUBT]] tomaravarṣā mālya mṛdū padumôtpala bhontī //
SA11sanss18u:545: duṣyâneka mṛdū sukhasparśā saṃstari mārgi vrajanti jinānāṃ /
SA11sanss18u:548: dharmaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn sarvata romata cintiya dharmān /
SA11sanss18u:551: dharmata nityasthitā gaganasthā sūcata dharmaviśodhani labdhā //
SA11sanss18u:552: raśmi sukhāpramukhêti kṛtvâikatu romamukhāt tu ṛṣīṇāṃ /
SA11sanss18u:554: te yathâikata romamukhāto osari gaṅgarajôpama raśmī /
SA11sanss18u:555: evam aśeṣata sarvatu romā deśa samādhivikurva ṛṣīṇāṃ //
SA11sanss18u:556: yena guṇena ya raśmi nivṛttā tasmi guṇeṣu sahāyaka pūrve /
SA11sanss18u:557: teṣu tam eva pramuñcati raśmiṃ jñānavikurvaṇâiṣa ṛṣīṇāṃ //
SA11sanss18u:558: teṣa ya puṇya sahāyaka pūrve yair anumodita yācita yebhiḥ /
SA11sanss18u:559: yebhi ca dṛṣṭa śubhôpacitaṃ vā te ima raśmi prajānati teṣāṃ //
SA11sanss18u:560: ye ca śubhôpacitāḥ kṛtapuṇyāḥ pūjita yebhi punaḥ punaḥ buddhāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:561: arthika chandika buddhaguṇebhiḥ codana teṣa karotiya raśmiḥ //
SA11sanss18u:563: sūrya yathā jātyandha na paśyī nô ca sa nâsti udeti sa loke /
SA11sanss18u:567: evata raśmi mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ asti ca te itare ca na paśyī /
SA11sanss18u:569: ābharaṇāni nipāna vimānāḥ ratna rasāyana gandhanulepāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:570: te pi tu asti mahâtmajanasya te ca sudurlabha kṛcchragatānāṃ //
SA11sanss18u:571: evata raśmi mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ asti ca te itare ca na paśyī /
SA11sanss18u:573: yasy imu [[DOUBT]] raśmiprabheda śruṇitvā bheṣyanti śraddadhimukti [[DOUBT]] prasādaḥ /
SA11sanss18u:574: tena na kāṅkṣa na saṃśaya kāryo nâṅga na bheṣyi mahāguṇaketuḥ //
SA11sanss18u:580: sarva parīvṛta buddhasutebhī ye ca samādhyasamādhivihārī //
SA11sanss18u:581: ye paripācita tena ṛṣīṇāṃ satva niṣpa-dita buddhaguṇeṣu /
SA11sanss18u:582: te parivāri ataṃ mahapadmaṃ sarvôdikṣiṣu prāñjalibhūtāḥ //
SA11sanss18u:587: yauvanavegasthiteṣu samāhita vyutthihi jīrṇaka vṛddha śarīrāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:593: pratyaya buddha śarīri samāhita vyutthihi buddhavarâgraśarīrā /
SA11sanss18u:599: ekatu romamukhasmi samāhita vyutthihi sarvata romamukheṣu /
SA11sanss18u:600: sarviṣu romamukheṣu samāhita vyutthihi ekatu vālapathātaḥ //
SA11sanss18u:601: ekatu vālapathasmi samāhita vyutthihi sarvata vālapathebhyaḥ /
SA11sanss18u:602: sarviṣu vālapatheṣu samāhita vyutthihi te paramâṇurajātaḥ //
SA11sanss18u:609: vṛkṣaphaleṣu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi raśmimukhebhi jinānāṃ //
SA11sanss18u:613: vāyupathe tu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi bhūmitalānu mahâtmā //
SA11sanss18u:614: bhūmitale tu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi sarvatu devavimānāt /
SA11sanss18u:615: sarvi tu devabalāna samāhita vyutthihi te gaganânusmṛtîmān //
SA11sanss18u:617: kalpâcintya prabhāṣiyamāṇāḥ sarvajinebhi na śakya kṣayītum //
SA11sanss18u:620: te ca vaśe sthitâṣṭa vimokṣāḥ śrāvakâika bhavībahu bhontī /
SA11sanss18u:621: bhūtva bahuḥ punâika bhavitvā dhyāyati prajvalate gaganasmin //
SA11sanss18u:622: te hi mahākaruṇāya vihīnā bodhi anarthiku lokôpekṣī /
SA11sanss18u:623: darśayi kāyavikurvâcintyā kasya na darśayi loka hitâiṣī //
SA11sanss18u:624: candra sa sūrya nabhe vicarantau darśayi sarvadiśi pratibhāsaṃ /
SA11sanss18u:629: evam acintiya darśiyi rūpaṃ sarvadaśaddiśi te naravīrāḥ /
SA11sanss18u:631: sāgaradeva rutāvatināmā yāvat satva samudry utpannā /
SA11sanss18u:632: teṣu svarâṅgaruteṣu vidhijñā toṣayi sarvarutān svarutena //
SA11sanss18u:633: sā hi sarāga sadoṣa rutāvati sarvarute pratighoṣa vidhijñā /
SA11sanss18u:634: dhāraṇidharmabalaṃ vaśiprāptā kaḥ sa na toṣi sadevakalokam //
SA11sanss18u:635: māyakaro yatha vidyavidhijño darśayi rūpa vicitrânantān /
SA11sanss18u:637: māyakaro hi sarāgu sadoṣo toṣayi māyavikurvita lokaṃ /
SA11sanss18u:638: dhyānâbhijña vimokṣasuśikṣita kasya na toṣayi caryavidhijñaḥ //
SA11sanss18u:639: rāhu yathêṣa ya nirmaṇi kāyaṃ kurvati vajra pade talabandhaṃ /
SA11sanss18u:640: darśana sāgaru nābhipramāṇaṃ bhoti sumerutale sama śīrṣaḥ //
SA11sanss18u:641: so 'pi sarāgu sadoṣa samoho rāhu nidarśayîdṛśa ṛddhī /
SA11sanss18u:642: mārapramardana lokapradīpa kasya na darśayi ṛddhi anantā //
SA11sanss18u:644: yātuka bimbaranekasurāṇāṃ tātuka nirmaṇi śakru svakāyān //
SA11sanss18u:646: sarvasurêndrasurāś ca vijānī śakrama ... purato gata svâyum /
SA11sanss18u:647: eṣa gṛhyeta vajradharāṇāṃ saṃbhramu gacchisu sarvasurêndrāḥ //
SA11sanss18u:648: netra sahasra bhayaṅkara darśī jvālapramuñcana vajra gṛhītaṃ /
SA11sanss18u:649: varmita kāya durāsada teja śakram udīkṣya palātv asurêndrāḥ //
SA11sanss18u:651: sarvajagasyâśeṣata trāṇāṃ akṣayapuṇya kuto na vikurvī // ...
SA11sanss18u:652: vāyuta saṃbhuta meghapravarṣī vāyuta megha punaḥ prasamentī /
SA11sanss18u:653: vāyuta sasya virohati loke vāyu sukhâvaha sarvajagasya //
SA11sanss18u:654: so hi aśikṣita pāramitāsu buddhaguṇeṣu aśikṣita vāyuḥ /
SA11sanss18u:655: darśayi lokavipākâcintyā kasya na darśayi te varalabdhā //
